pluggable.name: Import
pluggable.author: Chris Meller
pluggable.description: Imports a BlogML XML file generated by the Export plugin into your Habari blog. Includes: Users, Posts, Tags, Comments, and Options.

help.value: When importing / restoring a BlogML file all contents in the file are appended to your blog. Nothing is deleted beforehand, so clean out any default posts / comments / tags that may be created on install.
